A

AlexaAudioPlaybackListener - Interface in com.amazon.alexa.api
An AlexaAudioPlaybackListener is registered with the AlexaServices.AudioPlaybackControl api to receive Alexa audio playback updates.
AlexaPlaybackState - Enum in com.amazon.alexa.api
AlexaPlaybackState enumerates the different types of audio playback.
AlexaServices - Class in com.amazon.alexa.api
AlexaServices is used to access all Alexa APIs.
AlexaServices.Account - Class in com.amazon.alexa.api
Account APIs are used to manage the Amazon account used by AlexaServices
AlexaServices.AudioPlaybackControl - Class in com.amazon.alexa.api
AudioPlaybackControl is used to access all APIs related to controlling audio playback manually.
AlexaServices.Recognize - Class in com.amazon.alexa.api
Recognize is used to access all APIs related to recognizing user speech.
AlexaServices.Settings - Class in com.amazon.alexa.api
Settings is used to access all APIs related to Alexa settings.
AlexaServicesConnection - Class in com.amazon.alexa.api
An AlexaServicesConnection controls a connection to AlexaServices.
AlexaServicesConnection(Context) - Constructor for class com.amazon.alexa.api.AlexaServicesConnection
Creates an AlexaServicesConnection for use with AlexaServices APIs.
AlexaServicesConnection.ConnectionListener - Interface in com.amazon.alexa.api
ConnectionListener provides callbacks for connection updates to AlexaServices.
AlexaSettingsListener - Interface in com.amazon.alexa.api
An AlexaSettingsListener is registered with the AlexaServices.Settings to receive Alexa settings updates.
AlexaState - Enum in com.amazon.alexa.api
AlexaState enumerates all of Alexa's possible states during a dialog with a user.
AlexaStateListener - Interface in com.amazon.alexa.api
An AlexaStateListener is registered with the AlexaServices.Recognize api to receive Alexa state updates.
AlexaUserSpeechListener - Interface in com.amazon.alexa.api
An AlexaUserSpeechListener is registered with the AlexaServices.Recognize api to receive metadata about User Speech.

C

com.amazon.alexa.api - package com.amazon.alexa.api
Provides a set of API's for interacting with Alexa Voice Service on Android.
connect(PendingIntent, PendingIntent) - Method in class com.amazon.alexa.api.AlexaServicesConnection
